          <title>
            <string language="en">A two-way circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein bidirektionaler Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un circuit bi-directionnel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um circuito em dois sentidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un circuito bidirezionale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα διπλής κατεύθυνσης κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un circuito de dos vías</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the circuit connection of stairs lighting with two independent switches.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stairs lighting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">two-way circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Stromkreisanschluß der
Treppe, die mit zwei unabhängigen Schaltern beleuchtet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la connexion de circuit 
des escaliers s'allumant avec deux commutateurs indépendants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a conexão do circuito 
das escadas que iluminam-se com os dois interruptores independentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il collegamento del 
circuito delle scale che si illuminano con due interruttori 
indipendenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σύνδεση κυκλωμάτων των 
σκαλοπατιών που ανάβουν με δύο ανεξάρτητους διακόπτες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la conexión del 
circuito de las escaleras que se encienden con dos interruptores 
independientes.</string>
          </description>
